author: Connie Chen and Remi Rosmarin
title: 15 online stores with free in-store pickup to save time and shipping fees — from Target, Nordstrom, and more
description: Even with the variety of speedy shipping options available these days, sometimes you want to go into a store and pick up a product yourself. Whether it's to check out the product in person or because you need it right away, buying a product in a store has a l…
